description: Add an input for "Cost per kWh." Calculate and display the total cost to charge the battery and the estimated cost per kilometer.
title: Electricity Cost Calculator

descriptionHistory.description: Add an input for "Cost per kWh." Calculate and display the total cost to charge the battery and the estimated cost per kilometer.

ğŸ”§ Tool: Bash

  "command": "find . -type f -name \"*.ts\" -o -name \"*.tsx\" -o -name \"*.js\" -o -name \"*.jsx\" | grep -E \"(src|app)\" | head -30"
}

1.

 **Problem**:

 Users of the EV Scooter Calculator want to know the financial cost of charging their battery and the cost per kilometer to operate their scooter, but the current application only displays technical metrics (range, power, speed, etc.).

2.

 **Solution**:

 Add a new input field for "Cost per kWh" in the input section, then calculate and display two new metrics:

 total cost to fully charge the battery and estimated cost per kilometer based on consumption.

3.

 **Acceptance Criteria**:
   - GIVEN the user is on the EV Scooter Calculator, WHEN they enter a value for Cost per kWh, THEN the system should calculate and display the total cost to charge the battery
   - GIVEN the user is on the EV Scooter Calculator, WHEN they enter a value for Cost per kWh, THEN the system should calculate and display the estimated cost per kilometer
   - GIVEN the user is on the EV Scooter Calculator, WHEN no Cost per kWh value is entered, THEN the cost displays should show "--"
   - GIVEN the user is on the EV Scooter Calculator, WHEN they update any input values, THEN the cost calculations should update in real-time
   - GIVEN the user is on the EV Scooter Calculator, WHEN a valid Cost per kWh is entered, THEN the total cost and cost per km should be displayed with appropriate currency formatting

4.

 **Files to Modify**:
   | File | Purpose | Action |
   |

------|

---------|

--------|
   | index.html | Add cost input, calculation logic, and display areas | modify |

5.

 **Implementation Tasks**:
   ```tasks
   - [ ] T001:

 Add input field for "Cost per kWh" in the input form | File:

 index.html
   - [ ] T002:

 Update state management to include costPerKwh value | File:

 index.html
   - [ ] T003:

 Add calculation logic for total charge cost and cost per kilometer | File:

 index.html
   - [ ] T004:

 Add new stat boxes to display cost metrics in the results section | File:

 index.html
   - [ ] T005:

 Add event listeners for the new cost input | File:

 index.html
   ```

6.

 **Verification**:

 Create a Playwright test to verify:
   - Input for Cost per kWh is present and accepts values
   - Total charge cost is calculated correctly:

 (Battery Wh / 1000) Ã— Cost per kWh
   - Cost per kilometer is calculated correctly:

 (Cost per kWh Ã— Consumption Wh/km) / 1000
   - Values update in real-time when inputs change
   - Displays "--" when cost input is empty
